org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn

Class RestAuthenticationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.RestAuthenticationHandler

  • public class RestAuthenticationHandler
extends Object
    Handles the initial authenticate and subsequent callback submit RESTful calls.

      Constructors

      Constructs an instance of the RestAuthenticationHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • initiateAuthentication

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue initiateAuthentication(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                           String authIndexType,
                                                           String indexValue,
                                                           String sessionUpgradeSSOTokenId)
                                                    throws RestAuthException
        Handles authentication requests from HTTP both GET and POST. Will then either create the Login Process, as the request will be a new authentication request.
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest.
        response - The HttpServletResponse.
        authIndexType - The authentication index type.
        indexValue - The authentication index value.
        sessionUpgradeSSOTokenId - The SSO Token Id of the user's current session, null if not performing a session upgrade.
        Returns:
        The Response of the authentication request.
        Throws:
        RestAuthException

      • continueAuthentication

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue continueAuthentication(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                           org.forgerock.json.JsonValue postBody,
                                                           String authIndexType,
                                                           String indexValue,
                                                           String sessionUpgradeSSOTokenId)
                                                    throws RestAuthException
        Handles authentication requests from HTTP POST. Will then either create or retrieve the Login Process, dependent on if the request is a new authentication request or a continuation of one.
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest.
        response - The HttpServletResponse.
        postBody - The JsonValue post body of the request.
        sessionUpgradeSSOTokenId - The SSO Token Id of the user's current session, null if not performing a session upgrade.
        Returns:
        The Response of the authentication request.
        Throws:
        RestAuthException
